shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables the local snapshot upload feature.
Enables or disables the local snapshot upload feature.

p.codeblock: virtual int enableContentInspect(bool enabled, const media::ContentInspectConfig &config) = 0;
public abstract int enableContentInspect(boolean enabled, ContentInspectConfig config);

section.p: After enabling this feature, the SDK captures and uploads snapshots of the local user's video based on the module type and frequency you set in . Once the snapshot and upload are complete, the Agora server sends a callback notification to your app server via HTTPS and uploads all snapshots to a third-party cloud storage service.

The SDK captures and uploads snapshots of the local user's video based on the module type and frequency set in . After completing the capture and upload, the Agora server sends a callback notification to your application server via HTTPS and uploads all snapshots to third-party cloud storage.

ul.li: Before calling this method, ensure that you have enabled the local snapshot upload feature in the Agora Console.

If the video moderation module is set to use Agora's proprietary extension (CONTENT_INSPECT_SUPERVISION), you must use the local snapshot upload dynamic library . Deleting this library disables the snapshot upload feature.
Before calling this method, make sure you have enabled the local snapshot upload feature in the Agora Console.

If the video moderation module uses the Agora proprietary extension (CONTENT_INSPECT_TYPE_SUPERVISE), you need to use the local snapshot upload dynamic library . Removing this library disables the snapshot upload feature.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the local snapshot upload feature:
: Enable.
: Disable.

Whether to enable the local snapshot upload feature:
: Enable the local snapshot upload feature.
: Disable the local snapshot upload feature.
